allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix DAST job failure by installing wget in Docker image

The DAST job was failing because the Alpine-based Docker image
didn''t have wget installed, which is required for the healthcheck.
This caused the container to fail to start properly during the
DAST security scan.

Changes:
- Added wget installation in Dockerfile using apk package manager
- This fixes the healthcheck that was failing in the CD pipeline

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add master branch to CI/CD workflow triggers

The CI/CD pipeline wasn''t running because the workflow was only
configured for main and develop branches, but the repository uses
master as the main branch.

Changes:
- Added master branch to push and pull_request triggers in ci-cd.yml
- This will enable the CI/CD pipeline to run on PRs targeting master

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
